title: Housing and homelessness
author: editor3
excerpt: Help for renters and landlords Rental assistance for renters and landlords is available through the California COVID-19 Rent Relief Program. Go to the Housingiskey.com application portal or call 1‑833‑430‑2122 to apply as a renter or landlord.
